value.fullName: New Student: I have a high school diploma or equivalent like the GED and want to attend College for the first time.
value.label: New Student: I have a high school diploma or equivalent like the GED and want to attend College for the first time.

value.fullName: International Student: I'm a student from outside the United States.
value.label: International Student: I'm a student from outside the United States.

value.fullName: Returning Student: I'm a previous Pima student wanting to take classes.
value.label: Returning Student: I'm a previous Pima student wanting to take classes.

value.fullName: High School Student: I'm currently a high school student wanting to take college courses for both high school and college credit (Dual Enrollment) or college credit only (Early Admission).
value.label: High School Student: I'm currently a high school student wanting to take college courses for both high school and college credit (Dual Enrollment) or college credit only (Early Admission).

value.fullName: Transfer Student: I'm transferring to Pima from another college or university and have never applied to Pima before.
value.label: Transfer Student: I'm transferring to Pima from another college or university and have never applied to Pima before.

value.fullName: Guest Student: I'm a student at another college or university and would just like to take a few other classes at Pima.
value.label: Guest Student: I'm a student at another college or university and would just like to take a few other classes at Pima.

value.fullName: Adult Basic Education Student: I want to prepare for a High School Equivalency (HSE) exam like the GED, learn/improve my English, improve my basic skills in reading, writing or math, or learn about citizenship.
value.label: Adult Basic Education Student: I want to prepare for a High School Equivalency (HSE) exam like the GED, learn/improve my English, improve my basic skills in reading, writing or math, or learn about citizenship.

value.fullName: Community/Personal Development Student: I'm interested in noncredit courses or workshops for personal interest.
value.label: Community/Personal Development Student: I'm interested in noncredit courses or workshops for personal interest.

value.fullName: Workforce/Professional Student: I'm interested in workforce/skills training, Continuing Education Units (CEU) or taking classes arranged through my employer.
value.label: Workforce/Professional Student: I'm interested in workforce/skills training, Continuing Education Units (CEU) or taking classes arranged through my employer.
